description: Convinience tools for manipulating FITS images

parameters.name: force
parameters.info: overwrite output file even if it exists

parameters.name: sanitize
parameters.info: Sanitize FITS files by replacing NANs and INFs with a vlaue

parameters.name: transfer
parameters.info: transfer data from image 2 into image 1, preserving the FITS header of image 1

parameters.name: zoom
parameters.info: Zoom into central sqaure region given in pixles

parameters.name: stack
parameters.info: Stack a list of FITS images along a given axis. This axis may given as an integer(as it appears in the NAXIS keyword), or as a string (as it appears in the CTYPE keyword)

parameters.name: unstack
parameters.info: Unstack a FITS image into smaller chunks each having [each_chunk] planes along a given axis. This axis may given as an integer (as it appears in the NAXIS keyword), or as a string (as it appears in the CTYPE keyword)

parameters.name: unstack-chunk
parameters.info: Unstack FITS image into images of this width (along the given axis)

parameters.name: reorder
parameters.info: Required order. List of comma seperated indeces

parameters.name: add-axis
parameters.info: Add axis to a FITS image. The AXIS will be described by CTYPE:CRVAL:CRPIX:CDELT[:CUNIT:CROTA]. The keywords in brackets are optinal, while those not in brackets are mendatory. This axis will be the last dimension.

parameters.name: stats
parameters.info: Print stats on images and exit. No output images will be written
